channel.title: Anti nulls
channel.description:
Purpose: To disable nulls from connecting to your server Difficulty Level: 4-10 to Pk Servers
Required Knowledge: To know how to use the "Find" And know how to delete one line of code under Process();
Server Based: All, Because every server has a Process(); to make it run
Step 1: Go into your server source files
Step 2: Open up your Client.Java File
Step 3: Search for: Code: -------------------------------- Process(); ------------------------------- Step 4: Under "Process();" you should see the following line, REMOVE THE WHOLE THING! Code: ------------------------------- if(in == null) return false; --------------------------------- Save and Compile and Rune your server! Post your errors here.. Which there should be none otherwise you are here by officially retarded and need to be shot
credits. 90% me 10% to my friend
=) ;D

item.title: Anti nulls
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

Purpose: To disable nulls from connecting to your server
Difficulty Level: 4-10 to Pk Servers

Required Knowledge: To know how to use the “Find” And know how to delete one line of code under Process();

Server Based: All, Because every server has a Process(); to make it run

Step 1:
Go into your server source files

Step 2: Open up your Client.Java File

Step 3: Search for:
Code:

Process();

Step 4: Under “Process();” you should see the following line, REMOVE THE WHOLE THING!
Code:

if(in == null) return false;

Save and Compile and Rune your server!
Post your errors here… Which there should be none otherwise you are here by officially retarded and need to be shot

credits. 90% me 10% to my friend

=) ;D

Read full topic
